SamPy.cosmology.distances.getDiameterDistances¶

SamPy.cosmology.distances.getDiameterDistances(data, redshift=0)¶

Calculates a diameter distance in kpc / arc seconds from data for all unique redshifts. The redshift keyword indicates the column of redshifts.

Requires :cosmocalc
Param :data
Param :redshift column
Returns:diameter distances
Return type:dictionary
